description: A file upload component. This is a wrapper around an HTML file input. It can display multiple files as well as providing a convenient UI for removing/clearing files from the list.

props.name: disabled
props.description: The diabled state of the component

props.name: directUpload
props.description: Files are uploaded directly once added, there is no waiting to click a confirmation button

props.name: accept
props.description: HTML file input accept property for filtering the files the user is allowed to select. THis is a mime type, e.g. 'application/pdf'.

props.name: state
props.description: The state of the input, used to indicate loading, success and error states

props.name: label
props.description: The label of the file component button

props.name: icon
props.description: The icon of the file component button

events.name: input
events.description: Emitted when files are selected and uploaded
